meanings.definition: Machinery or equipment used in a particular industry or activity.
meanings.sent1: The enginery in the factory hummed with efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The enginery of the workshop was essential for production.
meanings.sent3: The enginery seemed to have a mind of its own, always working flawlessly.
meanings.sent4: The enginery of the printing press roared like a mighty beast.
meanings.sent5: The enginery gleamed under the bright lights, a symphony of moving parts.

meanings.definition: The design and construction of machinery or equipment.
meanings.sent1: The enginery of the new invention was revolutionary.
meanings.sent2: Engineers carefully planned the enginery for the project.
meanings.sent3: The enginery blueprint looked like a maze of lines and shapes.
meanings.sent4: The enginery of the clock tower was a masterpiece of precision.
meanings.sent5: The enginery displayed intricate details, a testament to human ingenuity.

meanings.definition: The skill or work of an engineer.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in enginery was unmatched in the field.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated her life to mastering the art of enginery.
meanings.sent3: The enginery of problem-solving was his favorite challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like intricate enginery, solving complex puzzles effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The enginery of innovation drove the team to new heights of success.
